name: IELTS Tips - Preparation - Road to 8.0 Free
description: If you are looking for IELTS tips and tricks application, so you are in the right place. This  IELTS Tips will help you to get the IELTS band 8.0 with a lot of tips, tricks, and practices.  Features: - Vocabularies: you will learn a lot of new words and phrases. - Reading - Writing - Listening - Speaking  This app is completely free. It can work offline, so you can bring it anywhere you want. Happy learning!!!
